name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_ACTPR
description: This table contains multiple-response acute problems of the newborn electronic birth certificate information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated acute problems of the newborn electronic birth certificate information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with acute problems of the newborn on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_NBRN_AC_PRB_C_NAME
columns.description: This item indicates the acute problems of the newborn on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account: 0-None, 1-Anemia, 2-Birth Injury, 3-Fetal Alcohol Syndrome, 4-Hyaline Membrane Disease/RDS, 5-Meconium Aspiration Syndrome, 6-Assisted Ventilation < 30min, 7-Assisted Ventilation >= 30min, 8-Seizures, 9-ABO Incompatibility, or 10-Other.
